description: The third Baron of Febdak (Faibdash), an obscure star system where Jinto and Lafiel made a stopover en route to Safugnoff (Sfagnaumh). He had an inferiority complex due to his clan`s origins and brief history, causing him to confine and isolate his own father. He tried to abduct Lafiel and imprison Jinto, which brought dire consequences onto himself.
name: Atosryua Syun-Atos Lyuf Raika Febdak Klowal
